translated: Because it is said to eradicate even very grave sins, it teaches that actions have no effects. Because it teaches that the Mahāyāna is different, and because it does not teach the classifications of dreams in the Kriyā Tantra, therefore this Mahāyāna was not taught by the Buddha.

original: 'di ni nges par bdud kyis skye bo blo gros ngan pa dang / rmongs pa rnams bslu bar bya ba'i phyir sna tshogs pa mang po brtsams pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni nges par bdud kyis skye bo blo gros ngan pa dang / rmongs pa rnams bslu bar bya ba'i phyir sna tshogs pa mang po brtsams pa yin no //
translated: This was certainly composed by Māra in order to deceive many evil-minded and ignorant people.

original: theg pa chen po'i lta ba 'di mngon sum la sogs pa dang shin tu 'gal bar ston pa /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i lta ba 'di mngon sum la sogs pa dang shin tu 'gal bar ston pa /
translated: This shows that the Mahāyāna view is in complete contradiction with direct perception and so on.

original: gzugs la sogs pa dmigs pa'i blo //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa dmigs pa'i blo //
translated: The mind that observes form and so on

original: rang rig nyid du yod pas kyang //🔽mngon sum gnod pa gang yin des //
analyzed: rang rig nyid du yod pas kyang // mngon sum gnod pa gang yin des //
translated: exists as reflexive awareness.🔽Whatever contradicts direct perception

original: skye med smra ba de la @156b gnod //
analyzed: skye med smra ba de la @156b gnod //
translated: contradicts the proponent of nonarising.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams la dmigs pa 'di la yod pas de ni gzugs la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i blo'o //🔽yul la rnam bar shes pa rnams te /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams la dmigs pa 'di la yod pas de ni gzugs la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i blo'o // yul la rnam bar shes pa rnams te /
translated: The mind that observes form, etc. is the mind that observes form, etc. because it exists in the observation of objects such as form.🔽The consciousnesses of objects are the consciousnesses of form, etc.

original: de ni dngos po'i ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: de ni dngos po'i ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: because they have the characteristic of thoroughly knowing the nature of things as they are.

original: / rang gi rgyud kyis nyams su myong bar bya ba yin pas rang rig go //
analyzed: / rang gi rgyud kyis nyams su myong bar bya ba yin pas rang rig go //
translated: Self-awareness is the awareness of one’s own continuum.

original: kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'gro ba ma lus pa yang yang dag par rig pas so //
analyzed: kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'gro ba ma lus pa yang yang dag par rig pas so //
translated: The word “also” indicates that all beings are also aware.

original: blo de ni yul dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir la ma skyes pa nyid du btags pa la ni rigs pa med pa'i phyir mngon sum gyis kyang gnod la /
analyzed: blo de ni yul dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir la ma skyes pa nyid du btags pa la ni rigs pa med pa'i phyir mngon sum gyis kyang gnod la /
translated: Since that mind is together with its object, it is contradicted by direct perception, because it is illogical to impute that which is not arisen.

original: 'jig rten gyi yang dag par rig pa bkag pas na /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi yang dag par rig pa bkag pas na /
translated: Since worldly awareness is refuted,

original: grags pas gnod pa yang skye ba med par smra ba la yod do //
analyzed: grags pas gnod pa yang skye ba med par smra ba la yod do //
translated: the assertion of nonarising is also contradicted by what is commonly accepted.

original: srid pa rnams ni de nyid du //
analyzed: srid pa rnams ni de nyid du //
translated: The existence of the world🔽is not refuted.🔽The world is not refuted

original: skye med ces bya'i khyad par gyis //
analyzed: skye med ces bya'i khyad par gyis //
translated: because of the distinction of nonarising in reality.

original: mngon sum dang ni grags pa dag / gnod pa 'di la med ce na //
analyzed: mngon sum dang ni grags pa dag / gnod pa 'di la med ce na //
translated: If you say, “There is no contradiction with respect to direct perception and renown,”

original: gal te dbu ma pa dag smra ba /
analyzed: gal te dbu ma pa dag smra ba /
translated: if the Madhyamaka speaks,

original: mig med gzugs la yod ma yin //
analyzed: mig med gzugs la yod ma yin //
translated: “Form does not exist without eyes,

original: bar dang gnyi ga la mi gnas //
analyzed: bar dang gnyi ga la mi gnas //
translated: it does not exist in between, and it does not exist in both.

original: gang du de ni gnas gyur pa //
analyzed: gang du de ni gnas gyur pa //
translated: Where does it exist?

original: yod pa ma yin med pa min //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin med pa min //
translated: It does not exist, nor does it not exist.”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir mngon sum yang 'byung ba yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir mngon sum yang 'byung ba yod pa ma yin la /
translated: and so on, because consciousness is not observed, direct perception does not occur.

original: 'jig rten ni mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis bsgribs pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi grags pa dang / mngon sum gyi gnod pa yang bdag gis don dam pa nyid mi 'byung ngo zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig rten ni mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis bsgribs pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi grags pa dang / mngon sum gyi gnod pa yang bdag gis don dam pa nyid mi 'byung ngo zhe na /
translated: Because the world is obscured by the cataracts of ignorance, the renown of the world and direct perception do not occur for me, the ultimate itself.

original: de nyid bzhad gang yin par lan gdab par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid bzhad gang yin par lan gdab par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to respond to that very laughter,🔽“One should correctly go to a place

original: bgrod min la yang yang dag tu //
analyzed: bgrod min la yang yang dag tu //
translated: that should not be gone to,

original: bgrod par bya ste bud med phyir //
analyzed: bgrod par bya ste bud med phyir //
translated: for the sake of a woman,

original: bud med gzhan bzhin zer ba yi //
analyzed: bud med gzhan bzhin zer ba yi //
translated: just like another woman.”🔽The words that have faults

original: skyon bcas tshig kyang skyon med 'gyur //
analyzed: skyon bcas tshig kyang skyon med 'gyur //
translated: become faultless.

original: bud med gang bgrod par bya ba ma yin par 'dod pa de yang don dam par bgrod par bya ba yin te zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bud med gang bgrod par bya ba ma yin par 'dod pa de yang don dam par bgrod par bya ba yin te zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: That which is held to be not to be approached by a woman is also ultimately to be approached. This is the thesis.

original: gtan tshigs ci yod /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ci yod /
translated: What is the reason?

original: bud med yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bud med yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is a woman.

original: gang dang gang bud med yin pa de ni bgrod par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gang dang gang bud med yin pa de ni bgrod par bya ba yin te /
translated: Whatever is a woman is to be approached.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is this so?

original: bud med gzhan bzhin te /
analyzed: bud med gzhan bzhin te /
translated: Like another woman.

original: rang gi chung ma bzhin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rang gi chung ma bzhin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning of like one’s own wife.

original: 'jig rten pa'i dang lung dag dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhe na /🔽don dam par @157a * //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i dang lung dag dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhe na / don dam par @157a * //
translated: If you say that this contradicts the world and scripture,🔽it is not a fault,

original: zhes khyad par du byas pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: zhes khyad par du byas pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: because the qualification ultimately is supplied.

original: 'di ni rigs pa dang 'gal ba yang yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni rigs pa dang 'gal ba yang yin te /
translated: This also contradicts reason.

original: ji ltar gdung ba'i dbang gis bud med la 'jug par gyur pa na bgrod par bya ba dang / bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa dag gis gdung ba zhi bar byed par mnyam pa nyid do zhes de skad du smra ba de dag ni blo gros ngan pas smra ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar gdung ba'i dbang gis bud med la 'jug par gyur pa na bgrod par bya ba dang / bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa dag gis gdung ba zhi bar byed par mnyam pa nyid do zhes de skad du smra ba de dag ni blo gros ngan pas smra ba ste /
translated: Those who say this are fools.

original: de la yang skyon med par 'gyur la de bzhin du dngos po thams cad la skur pa 'debs pa khyed kyi tshig kyang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: de la yang skyon med par 'gyur la de bzhin du dngos po thams cad la skur pa 'debs pa khyed kyi tshig kyang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: The same fault would apply to your words, which deny all things.

original: skyon chen po gzhan yang yod de //
analyzed: skyon chen po gzhan yang yod de //
translated: There is another great fault.

original: bden pa mthong ba de nyid min //
analyzed: bden pa mthong ba de nyid min //
translated: The one who sees the truth is not the reality.

original: de nyid med par thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de nyid med par thal bar 'gyur //
translated: It follows that the reality does not exist.

original: nam mkha'i lha yis bstan pa ltar //
analyzed: nam mkha'i lha yis bstan pa ltar //
translated: It is like the teaching of the god of the sky.

original: de nyid yin par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: de nyid yin par mi 'dod do //
translated: We do not assert that to be the reality.

original: theg pa chen po la yang sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam ma yin la /
analyzed: theg pa chen po la yang sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam ma yin la /
translated: In the Mahayana, there is no suffering, origin, cessation, or path.

original: sdug bsngal la sogs pa shes pas kyang yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o zhes ston pa'i tshig yod par grags te /
analyzed: sdug bsngal la sogs pa shes pas kyang yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o zhes ston pa'i tshig yod par grags te /
translated: The statement “One does not attain nirvana through the knowledge of suffering, etc.” is well known.

original: bden pa mthong ba de kho na nyid ma yin na de ma yin pa'i de kho na nyid gzhan gang yin zhes brjod do //
analyzed: bden pa mthong ba de kho na nyid ma yin na de ma yin pa'i de kho na nyid gzhan gang yin zhes brjod do //
translated: If the vision of the truth is not reality tattva, what other reality is there that is not that vision?

original: theg pa chen po las bstan pa'i de kho na nyid yod do zhe na /
analyzed: theg pa chen po las bstan pa'i de kho na nyid yod do zhe na /
translated: If you say that reality is taught in the Mahāyāna,

original: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: that is not logical.

original: bden pa mthong ba las gzhan yin pa'i phyir nam mkha'i lhas bstan pa bzhin no //
analyzed: bden pa mthong ba las gzhan yin pa'i phyir nam mkha'i lhas bstan pa bzhin no //
translated: Because it is other than the vision of the truth, it is like the teaching of the god of the sky.

original: de dag ni 'di lta bu'i de kho na nyid ston te /
analyzed: de dag ni 'di lta bu'i de kho na nyid ston te /
translated: They teach reality in this way:

original: gser gyi snod du gser gyi khab kyis grog ma phug nas gsang na 'khor ba las grol bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: gser gyi snod du gser gyi khab kyis grog ma phug nas gsang na 'khor ba las grol bar 'gyur la /
translated: If one pierces a termite hill with a golden needle in a golden vessel and hides it, one is liberated from samsara.

original: de gsod pa po yang thar pa'i sa bon bsags par 'dod pa dang / ba lang la sogs pa bsad pa dang skyed par byed pa la nyal po byas pas mtho ris la sogs pa'i rgyu yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de gsod pa po yang thar pa'i sa bon bsags par 'dod pa dang / ba lang la sogs pa bsad pa dang skyed par byed pa la nyal po byas pas mtho ris la sogs pa'i rgyu yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Also, the one who kills it is said to be accumulating the seed of liberation, and that killing cattle and so on and having sexual intercourse with one’s mother and so on are causes of high rebirth and so on.

original: gzhan yang khams gsum pa 'di ni sems tsam mo zhes bya ba'i mdo'i don yang gzhan du btags nas phyi rol gyi skye mched la sogs pa dgag pa'i phyir ston par byed pa yang rigs pa 'dis na mi rigs te /
analyzed: gzhan yang khams gsum pa 'di ni sems tsam mo zhes bya ba'i mdo'i don yang gzhan du btags nas phyi rol gyi skye mched la sogs pa dgag pa'i phyir ston par byed pa yang rigs pa 'dis na mi rigs te /
translated: Moreover, the meaning of the sūtra statement “This threefold world is mind only” is interpreted otherwise, and it is taught in order to refute external bases and so on. This is also illogical because of the reasoning above.

original: phyi rol skye mched yod pa las //
analyzed: phyi rol skye mched yod pa las //
translated: Because external bases exist,
